title: ICICIBANK: Textbook breakout forming at ₹1004
content:
📈 ICICIBANK: Textbook breakout forming at ₹1004

Been tracking this for 3 weeks. Today's the day.
Here's the complete setup:

📊 TECHNICAL CONFLUENCE:
• Breaking 140-DMA: ₹1969 ✅
• Volume spike: 3.9x average ✅
• MACD crossover: Bullish ✅
• RSI: 61 (room to run) ✅

📐 CHART PATTERNS:
• Cup & Handle completion at ₹2100
• Ascending triangle breakout pending
• Support tested 5 times at ₹1751

🎯 TRADE SETUP:
Entry: ₹1735 - ₹2189
Target 1: ₹1759 (book 50%)
Target 2: ₹2482 (book 30%)
Target 3: ₹2150 (trail rest)
Stop Loss: ₹1832

⏰ TIMEFRAME: 
• Entry: Next 2 sessions
• T1: 5-7 days
• T2: 10-15 days
• T3: 20-30 days

💰 POSITION SIZING:
• Risk per trade: 1-2% of capital
• Position size: Calculate based on SL
• Don't average down if wrong

📊 MARKET CONTEXT:
Range-bound market favors this setup.
FII/DII: ₹+1,462 Cr/₹-1,614 Cr
Sector: Bank NIFTY (+0.0%) showing strength

🔍 INVALIDATION:
Close below ₹1984 negates setup.

Executing this trade? Let me know 👇
